entity.description: Holds the Email Server Profiles of an organization

attributes.name: emailserverprofileid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the email server profile.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: organizationid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the record.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the email server profile is active or inactive.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_statecode
constrainedList.description: Status of the Mail Server Profile

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the email server profile's status.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the MailServerProfile

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type a meaningful name for the email server profile. This name is displayed when you need to select an email server profile.

attributes.name: servertype
attributes.description: Select the profile's email server type.

attributes.name: outgoingserverlocation
attributes.description: Type the location of the server for outgoing email.

attributes.name: incomingserverlocation
attributes.description: Type the location of the server for incoming email.

attributes.name: incomingusername
attributes.description: Type the user name for incoming email.

attributes.name: outgoingusername
attributes.description: Type the user name for outgoing email.

attributes.name: incomingportnumber
attributes.description: Type the Exchange port number for incoming mail.

attributes.name: outgoingportnumber
attributes.description: Type the Exchange port number for outgoing mail.

attributes.name: incomingusessl
attributes.description: Select whether to use the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol for incoming email.

attributes.name: outgoingusessl
attributes.description: Select whether to use the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol for outgoing email.

attributes.name: useautodiscover
attributes.description: Select whether to automatically discover the server location

attributes.name: incomingauthenticationprotocol
attributes.description: Select the incoming email authentication protocol that is used for connecting to the email server.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_authenticationprotocol
constrainedList.description: Authentication protocol used when connecting to the email server.

attributes.name: outgoingcredentialretrieval
attributes.description: Select how credentials will be retrieved for outgoing email.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_outgoingcredentialretrieval
constrainedList.description: Options specifying the credential retrieval method for outgoing connection.

items.displayName: Credentials Specified by a User or Queue
Credentials Specified in Email Server Profile

attributes.name: incomingcredentialretrieval
attributes.description: Select how credentials will be retrieved for incoming email.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_incomingcredentialretrieval
constrainedList.description: Options specifying the credential retrieval method.

items.displayName: Credentials Specified by a User or Queue
Credentials Specified in Email Server Profile

attributes.name: encodingcodepage
attributes.description: Indicates the code page to use when encoding email content.

attributes.name: processemailsreceivedafter
attributes.description: Shows the date and time after which email messages that are received will be processed for mailboxes associated with the email server profile.

attributes.name: maxconcurrentconnections
attributes.description: Maximum number of concurrent connections allowed to the email server per authenticated user.

attributes.name: outgoingautograntdelegateaccess
attributes.displayName: Auto Grant Delegate Access for Outgoing Email.
attributes.description: Indicates whether the email connector will grant delegate access permissions to the accessing user when required while processing outgoing emails.

attributes.name: outgoinguseimpersonation
attributes.description: Select whether to use impersonation for accessing the mailbox to process outgoing emails.

attributes.name: incominguseimpersonation
attributes.description: Select whether to use impersonation to access the mailbox to process incoming emails.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Select the business unit that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: incomingpartnerapplication
attributes.description: Indicates the incoming partner application.

attributes.name: outgoingpartnerapplication
attributes.description: Indicates the outgoing partner application.

attributes.name: moveundeliveredemails
attributes.displayName: Move Undelivered Emails to the Undeliverable Folder
attributes.description: Indicates whether to move undelivered incoming emails to the Undeliverable folder in Microsoft Exchange.

attributes.name: minpollingintervalinminutes
attributes.description: Minimum polling interval, in minutes, for mailboxes that are associated with this email server profile.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information that describes the email server profile.

attributes.name: usesamesettingsforoutgoingconnections
attributes.displayName: Use Same Settings for Outgoing Connection
attributes.description: Select whether to use the same settings for incoming and outgoing connections.

attributes.name: outgoingauthenticationprotocol
attributes.description: Select the outgoing email authentication protocol that is used for connecting to the email server.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_authenticationprotocol
constrainedList.description: Authentication protocol used when connecting to the email server.

attributes.name: exchangeversion
attributes.description: Select the version of Exchange that is on the email server.

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_exchangeversion
constrainedList.description: Exchange version of the email server

attributes.name: entityimageid
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: timeoutmailboxconnection
attributes.description: Select whether to timeout a single mailbox.

attributes.name: sendemailalert
attributes.displayName: Send an alert email to the owner of the email server profile reporting on major events
attributes.description: Select whether to send an email alert if more than 50% of the mailboxes in this email server profile failed to synchronize in an hour period.

attributes.name: timeoutmailboxconnectionafteramount
attributes.displayName: Timeout a Single Mailbox Connection After this Amount of Milliseconds
attributes.description: Type the number of milliseconds to timeout a single mailbox. The upper limit is 100 seconds.

attributes.name: emailservertypename
attributes.description: Email Server Type Name

attributes.name: exchangeonlinetenantid
attributes.description: Type the tenant ID of Exchange Online.

attributes.name: lasttestexecutionstatus
attributes.description: Shows the last test Execution status of email server profile

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_lasttestexecutionstatus
constrainedList.displayName: Select the status of the Test
constrainedList.description: Internally selects based on the execution of Test

attributes.name: lasttestvalidationstatus
attributes.description: Shows the last test Validation status of email server profile

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_lasttestvalidationstatus
constrainedList.displayName: Select the status of the Test
constrainedList.description: Internally selects based on the execution of Test

attributes.name: lasttestrequest
attributes.description: Shows the EWS Request created during the Last Test

attributes.name: lasttestresponse
attributes.description: Shows the EWS Response obtained during the Last Test

attributes.name: lastteststarttime
attributes.description: Shows the Last Test Start date and time

attributes.name: lasttesttotalexecutiontime
attributes.description: Shows the Time taken while running the last test

attributes.name: owneremailaddress
attributes.displayName: Email Server Profile Owner's email address
attributes.description: Email Server Profile Owner's email address

attributes.name: usedefaulttenantid
attributes.description: Select whether to use the Exchange Online Tenant ID obtained from running Microsoft Azure PowerShell cmdlets (highly recommended). If you select No, you can edit this field manually

attributes.name: lastauthorizationstatus
attributes.description: Shows the last test authorization status of email server profile

constrainedList.name: emailserverprofile_lastauthorizationstatus
constrainedList.displayName: Select the status of the Test
constrainedList.description: Internally selects based on the execution of Test

attributes.name: lastcrmmessage
attributes.description: Shows the Dynamics 365 message obtained during the Last Test

attributes.name: defaultserverlocation
attributes.description: Type the default location of the server.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version number of the email server profile.
